name: facts-about-google
description: Fun way to learn more about Google!
author: Google Inc.

scripts.setup: cd ../../../../.. && yarn && yarn package && cd - && yarn sync && npm i
scripts.sync: rm -rf actions-on-google-*.tgz node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json && cp ../../../../../actions-on-google-*.tgz actions-on-google-v2.tgz
